data.text:
#AirFrance offers a range of flexible rebooking and cancellation options.

Up to the day of departure you can change your trip for any reason.

We've also extend our flexible service: all tickets are 100% refundable for travel booked up to 31 March 2022.

https://t.co/GXhhzZ6btm https://t.co/WsFQna6cUS

data.text: @richa_misha We've replied to you via DM, Richa. Please check your inbox. We kindly advise you to continue communicating with us via DM to avoid confusion and to edit your message and delete your booking reference as we do not recommend passengers to share that details in public. Thank you.

data.text: @Rachel_Kleimunt Hello @Rachel_Kleimunt. Selecting a standard Economy Class seat remains free of charge for all passengers during the check-in phase. Passengers who would like to select their seat prior to the check-in phase can now do so as a paid option. We hope this helps.

Canada is ready to welcome you back!
